document.docAuthor: Bolger, Thomas, Arroyo, Julio & Piotrowska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

bibRefCitation.author: Halbert, J. N.
bibRefCitation.refString: Halbert, J. N. (1923) Notes on Acari, with descriptions of new species. Journal of the Linnean Society, Zoology, 35, 363 - 392. https: // doi. org / 10.1111 / j. 1096 - 3642.1923. tb 01732. x

subSubSection.paragraph:
• Alliphis halleri
(G. & R. Canestrini, 1881)

• Original name :
Gamasus halleri
G. & R. Canestrini, 1881.
• In : Atti del Reale Istituto veneto di scienze, lettere ed arti, Series 5, 7: 1077.

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Copriphis ( Alliphis ) halleri
(G. & R. Canestrini) ( Halbert, 1923 ).
Counties: Carlow, Cork, Dublin, Galway, Kildare, Kilkenny, Limerick, Meath, Offaly, Wexford .

• Original name :
Eviphis concentricus Oudemans, 1905
.

• In :
Entomologische Berichten Nederland
, 2: 1.
Irish Records : Pasture ( Purvis, 1978 , O’Neill, 1981 ).
Counties: Kildare, Meath .

• Original name :
Eviphis holsaticus Willmann, 1937
.
• In : Schriften des Naturwissenschaftichen Vereins fuer Schleswig -Holstein , 22: 18.
Counties: Kildare .

• Original name :
Iphis ostrinus Koch, 1836
• In : Deutschlands Crustaceen , Myriopoden und Arachniden . 1835–1844 . Regensburg, fasc.2 (6).

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature: Euphis
ostrinus (Koch)
( Halbert, 1915 ; Hull, 1918 ).
Counties: Donegal, Dublin, Kildare, Kilkenny, Mayo, Wexford, Wicklow .

Thinoseius Halbert, 1920
•
Thinoseius fucicolus ( Halbert, 1920 )
• Original name :
Lasioseius fucicola Halbert, 1920
. • In : Proceedings of the Royal Irish Academy , 35: 125. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Lasioseius fucicola Halbert (Halbert, 1920)
,
Thinoseius berlesii Halbert (Halbert, 1920
, c.f. Luxton, 1998 ).
Irish Records : Decaying seaweed on rocky shore ( Halbert, 1920 , see also Anon. 1918 ); sandy beach
Counties: Dublin, Wexford .
